subject: Hispanic-Americans
Solheim Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Two rookies on the U.S. team share a Hispanic heritage with the Hall of Famer Nancy Lopez. Before this year, Lopez was the only Latina to have played on any U.S. team.
snippet: Two rookies on the U.S. team share a Hispanic heritage with the Hall of Famer Nancy Lopez. Before this year, Lopez was the only Latina to have played on any U.S. team.
